TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定從數位簽章範圍中排除之 XPS 的組件。

span.span: Specifies the parts of the XPS that are excluded from the range of a digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別具有允許其成員值的位元組合 flagsattribute 標記列舉。This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values. 從數位簽章中排除指定的組件可以修改必然會使簽章失效。Parts that are specified as excluded from the digital signature can be modified without invalidating the signature. 例如，如果文件是由多人簽署，SignatureOrigin 部分需要先簽署文件時，會排除簽章。For example, if a document is to be signed by more than one person, the SignatureOrigin part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed. (排除項目中指定`restrictions`參數呼叫。)如果未排除 SignatureOrigin 一部分，任何其他的簽章失效的第一個簽署的簽章。(Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to .) If the SignatureOrigin part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer. 如需有關數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 文章：*開放式封裝慣例的數位簽章架構*位於[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 如需有關核心屬性和簽章來源組件的詳細資訊，請參閱第 3 章的*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個列舉型別，以數位方式簽署[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following example shows how to use this enumeration to digitally sign an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignXpsDocument](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDefinitionsAndSigning.cs#signxpsdocument)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignXpsDocument](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedefinitionsandsigning.vb#signxpsdocument)]

.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions CoreMetadata = int32(1)

summary.span: 核心屬性的組件已經排除。

span.span: The Core Properties part is excluded.

.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions SignatureOrigin = int32(4)

summary.span: 簽章原點的組件已經排除。

span.span: The Signature Origin part is excluded.
